newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka Tea up on buoyant outlook.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka Tea up on buoyant outlook.

text.p: Sri Lanka's Tea Smallholder Factories Ltd was up 1.9 percent, or 50 cents to 26.25 rupees, on turnover of 8,600 shares, brokers said.
"Retail investors are buying bcause they expect 1997 to be another good year for the tea sector," said a local broker.
The industry, which enjoyed a good year in 1996 with record high prices, is expected to remain buoyant in 1997 when Iraq enters the market actively, he said.
Tea Smallholder Factories processes tea bought from small producers. ---Colombo newsroom (941) 434319
